about_the_game:
* NOTE: A CONTROLLER OR STEERING WHEEL IS REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME *

SIM SPORTS RAID is a racing simulator (simracing) focused on RALLY-RAID and NAVIGATION that aims to provide users with a realistic experience, both in terms of physics and competition. Take care of your vehicle, make repairs, ask for help while you listen to the indications of your co-driver both in open stages and SECRET STAGES and without previous training.

And if what you want is competition against rivals in multiplayer format, we also offer you our CHALLENGE version so you can unleash your adrenaline in fast and competitive events. In championships or in a personal way.

As an additional complement, we also offer, through our App, management tools so that organizers, communities, brands, groups of friends, leisure centers, etc., can design their personalized proposals.

SIM SPORTS RAID - RALLY RAID AND NAVIGATION

SIM SPORTS RAID allows you to compete, in a very realistic way, in Rally-Raid and Navigation events. Feel the competition and the orientation as a real pilot, with the help of your co-driver, the road map and the assistance.

WEAR AND TEAR, BREAKDOWNS AND AIDS

In order to be successful in these modalities, it is essential that you take care of your vehicle. The most important thing is to finish the stages with as little damage as possible, without penalties and without repair penalties. Keep an eye on your shock absorbers, treat your tires well and avoid those objects that damage them; do not force the engine and keep an eye on the temperature of your radiator.

If you get lost, you can also ask for help from your GPS and if you overturn or enter areas that you cannot get out of by your own means, you can ask for a hand. Of course, with its cost in time.

WEATHER

In the free training mode, you can apply the meteorology you want, within those that are offered as the game progresses.

For the design of events, the organizers can create a personalized weather evolution that will be the same for all participants.

Each terrain, each texture, has a different behavior in both dry and wet conditions, so you will notice the change in the physics as the weather evolves.

TELEMETRY AND REPLAYS

The information of the official events is collected on our servers. This information serves as a copy of the users' performances and as a control of their participation and available to the organization.

PUBLIC AND OFFICIAL COMPETITIONS

From SIM SPORTS we propose events so that you can compete without worrying about anything else. We also provide tools so that communities, brands, groups of friends, teams, leisure centers, etc., can create their proposals in a simple way.

The official events consist of stages that are only used in that kind of events, so they cannot be trained in a repetitive way. In this way, the participants' strengths are equalized.

Public events are made up of stages that are free to use. They can be trained much more and will serve you not only to compete but also to train you thoroughly.

CREATE YOUR OWN CHAMPIONSHIPS

Licensed users can create their own events using the stages and vehicles available to them. With the administration and management tools, it is possible to inform licensees of these proposals in a simple way, guaranteeing maximum diffusion. In addition, we can customize the advertising of the events and even of the information pages.

During the “early access” phase of SIM SPORTS RAID, we will limit the number of organizers who can create their own events in order to measure interest and size the structure accordingly.

ADMINISTRATION AND MANAGEMENT

We know that there are mainly two types of players in these disciplines: “gamers” and “simracers”. For the latter we offer tools with which you will be able to publish the rules of your events, control the starting times, evaluate the competition without the need of additional stewards and many more utilities that we will be incorporating.

SIM SPORTS CHALLENGE - MULTIPLAYER CHALLENGES

This mode offers players the possibility of facing each other in “one on one” duels through circuits all over the world. You can face each other in many different ways, depending on your intention:

VERSUS MODE

With this system you will face the replays of drivers from all over the world. It's like an AI, but with the big difference that those lines, those timings, that driving style was made by a real player. A possible rival. You can even face your own replays, which will serve as training.

QUICK MODE

A way to face any user in a very simple and fast way. You only have to choose a circuit, a vehicle and? that's it! All you have to do is wait for an opponent to click on your proposal and in 30 seconds you will be facing each other face to face. It couldn't be easier.

CHAMPIONSHIP MODE

Through this competition mode, authorized users will be able to create events of up to 256 players in “one-on-one” duels with “tennis-style” squares. There are even consolation duels so that everyone can compete in the same number of races. And we'll leave it all to you on our website. Call, registration, draw, scheduling, results, next duels... everything you need to offer a fast and exciting competition to your community, friends, teams, clients, etc.

All these tools and utilities will grow based on the acceptance of our proposal.

Competition, excitement and adventure are at your hands!
